game.name: Super Cakeboy
game.desc: Once again take the role of Cakeboy in this sequel to Khimera: Destroy all Monster Girls' "game-within-a-game". Run, jump, punch and use the variety of pastry-themed weapons at your disposal to blast through 9 action-packed stages. Face off against Cakeboy's eternal rival, the enigmatic Dark Cake and send him packing!
